entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Morrisburg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:12 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Risk of a thunderstorm early this morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
